actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to grant court leave to Federal employees when called as witnesses in certain judicial proceedings.

summary.text: Grants court leave to Federal employees called as witnesses in judicial proceedings to which a State or local government is a party.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to grant court leave to Federal employees when called as witnesses in certain judicial proceedings.
